content.text: Match ends, FC Schalke 04 2, Arsenal 2.
Second Half ends, FC Schalke 04 2, Arsenal 2.
Attempt saved. Theo Walcott (Arsenal) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Substitution, FC Schalke 04. Tranquillo Barnetta replaces Lewis Holtby.
Substitution, Arsenal. André Santos replaces Lukas Podolski.
Substitution, Arsenal. Francis Coquelin replaces Santiago Cazorla.
Attempt missed. Jermaine Jones (FC Schalke 04) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Klaas-Jan Huntelaar.
